info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong Northerly Winds Will Impact Some Southwestern Valleys Through Late This Afternoon... Strong northerly winds will impact the north to south oriented valleys of Southwest Montana for the remainder of this afternoon. Wind speeds will generally run in the 30 to 40 mph range, with gusts up to 55 mph at times. The winds may cause difficult travel, especially for high profile vehicles. Also, blowing dust may significantly reduce visibility for roadways adjacent open fields. Anyone traveling should use extreme caution and anticipate travel difficulties due to the strong winds and potential reductions in visibility.
